::Sickle::

           Sickle, the dark shadow, looms above a forest in the=
 sky.  It sees some squirrels in a tree, and some birds.  Sickle is happy a=
t this, and shapes itself into a happy face.  It then shapes itself into a =
frowning face, as it sees a dead rat on the ground.  Sickle moves down by t=
he rat.  Sickle starts floating around the rat, and then tries to find the =
rat's soul in the Abyss of Earth.  It finds the rat's soul, and uses it to =
bring the rat to life.  Sickle shapes into another smily face as the rat ge=
ts up and scurries off.  Sickle, the dark entity from the Abyss of Earth, h=
as arisen to rid the world of all things without a soul......That means tra=
nsformers.

------=_NextPart_000_001D_01C01389.6C4B5EE0
